DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Radiation therapy use high-energy x-rays damage tumor cell . Drugs carbogen niacinamide may make tumor cell sensitive radiation therapy . It yet know whether radiation therapy effective without carbogen niacinamide treat patient bladder cancer . PURPOSE : Randomized phase III trial compare effectiveness radiation therapy without carbogen niacinamide treat patient locally advanced bladder cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy With Without Carbogen Niacinamide Treating Patients With Bladder Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare 6-month cystoscopic response patient locally advance transitional cell carcinoma bladder treat radical radiotherapy without radiosensitization carbogen niacinamide . - Compare local failure-free overall disease-specific survival patient treat regimen . - Compare treatment-related morbidity , particular acute chronic bowel bladder symptom , patient treat regimen . - Compare quality life patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive radical radiotherapy daily , 5 day week , 4-6.4 week . Patients also receive oral niacinamide daily 1.5-2 hour initiation radiotherapy dose carbogen close breathing system ( face mask tight air seal mouthpiece nasal clip ) daily begin 5 minute initiation continue completion radiotherapy dose . - Arm II : Patients receive radiotherapy arm I . Quality life assess baseline ; 4 week ; 3 , 6 , 12 month ; annually 4 year . Patients follow 8 12 week ; 6 , 9 , 12 month ; every 6 month 4 year . Peer Reviewed Funded Endorsed Cancer Research UK PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 330 patient ( 165 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
